Transpire

Who they are

Transpire is building a community around Transhumanism and Planet Preservation. It aims to be a go-to-place for all radical life extension & Planet preservation topics. Transhumanism refers to the belief or theory that the human race can evolve beyond its current physical and mental limitations, especially by means of science and technology.

Their manifesto:

  • I Reject Indoctrination and Embrace Science and Continuous Improvement
  • My Happiness & Health Make the World Better Off
  • I Claim a Right to Augment and Amplify my Physical and Mental Capabilities
  • I Recognize my Power to Improve the World and Acknowledge my Responsibility towards Other Living Creatures & My Planet


What they need

Transpire is looking for community building tools. They are looking for a developer who has some familiarity with Wordpress to help implement a Reddit style voting process for uploaded projects. (Some work on the project upload is also wanted) In addition, there is a piece of work around creating more community support tools (e.g. setup a forum).

Desired skills:

  • Familiarity with Wordpress
  • Knowledge of PHP would help
  • An Interest in online community tools
  • Knowledge of SEO


This project would be interesting for

This project would be good for a developer interested in getting more experience with client interactions, scope setting and evaluating various approaches.

It would also be a good starting point for those wishing to help an already successful organisation grow their community and gain experience in with product management.
